name: SCNTube
desc: A tube or pipe geometry—a right circular cylinder with a circular hole along its central axis.

items.name: init(innerRadius: CGFloat, outerRadius: CGFloat, height: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a tube geometry with the specified inner radius, outer radius, and height.

items.name: var outerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of the tube’s outer circular cross section. Animatable.

items.name: var innerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of the circular hole through the tube. Animatable.

items.name: var height: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the tube along its y-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var radialSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions around the circumference of the tube. Animatable.

items.name: var heightSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions in the inner and outer surfaces of the tube along its y-axis. Animatable.
